mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_TIME ) VALUES ( #{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_TIME FROM board WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_TIME FROM board WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = #{boardCategory}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_TIME FROM board ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC) as T1 limit #{skip}, #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = #{boardCategory}
SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 Num, board.* FROM board ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) ROWNUM WHERE BOARD_NO between 1 and 10 AND BOARD_CATEGORY = #{boardCategory}
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_TIME FROM board ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 Num, board.* FROM board , category , ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) N WHERE board.BOARD_CATEGORY = #{boardCategory} AND category.CTG_NUM = #{boardCategory} AND (@ROWNUM := 0)=0 ORDER BY CTG_NUM ASC LIMIT #{skip}. #{amount}
SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TIME FROM board WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
